title: VILLAGE / LILLY SANDCASTLE
description: This is the interaction dialogue with Lilly's Little Sandcastle, where she hid the gloves.

dialogueTree.title: Sandcastle: "The fortress is still defiantly sta..."
dialogueTree.text: The fortress is still defiantly standing. There's an inviting gleam of *something* coming from the depths of the deepest cellars.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""The little castle?" The lieutenant..."
links.text: "The little castle?" The lieutenant smiles a little. "The reigning lord must have come upon some really tough times to let it slip in such decrepitude."

links.title: Sandcastle: "A gush of wind disintegrates anothe..."
links.text: A gush of wind disintegrates another piece of the cellar ceiling, exposing more of the mysterious glimmer underneath. The shithole's about to collapse.

links.title: Half Light: "The building's coming down on you,..."
links.text: The building's coming down on you, you need to get out of here!

links.title: Visual Calculus: "Smooth reflective surface... are th..."
links.text: Smooth reflective surface... are these the gloves you're looking for?

links.title: You: "Reach in the catacombs and pull out..."
links.text: Reach in the catacombs and pull out the shiny object.

links.title: Sandcastle: "The walls and floors give way to th..."
links.text: The walls and floors give way to the giant's greed, collapse and present you with a pair of ceramic gauntlets.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Congratulations -- that's the gaun..."
links.text: "Congratulations -- that's the gauntlets down, then. We're doing good on the armour collection front."

dialogueTree.title: Sandcastle: "Weather has not been kind to Lily's..."
dialogueTree.text: Weather has not been kind to Lily's little sandcastle. The once mighty towers are quickly eroding away. You can see something shining back to you from what must have been a vast underground catacomb network.
